title.c: There is one truth of the Invision Themes

desc.r: was created in cooperation with Patreon. I would like to thank everyone Patrons who are funding the development of this project. You guys are doing a great job. All this could not have been possible without your help.
desc.g: Become a Patron and Support Lukazuki in Development 💪
desc.b: If you found any problem with this project or you have a idea of what can be added. Please go to the Official Support and post your entry.
desc.d: Donations supports are welcome, but they are not obligatory. Want to use only for free? Of course, you can. Thats what I made this project for. But if you want to thank me for what I do. If you want get access to the latest updates and other stuff. Go to my page Patreon.com/lukazuki, select the right tier, and enjoy expanded content.
